Barcelona gikk p√• overraskende poengtap i Champions League
Barcelona gikk p√• et pinlig poengtap i Champions League-m√∏tet med tsjekkiske Slavia Praha.
05 Nov 2019, 20:05 by NTB

BARCELONA - SLAVIA PRAHA 0‚Äì0

Kampen p√• Camp Nou endte 0-0. I det omvendte oppgj√∏ret for 14 dager siden ble Barcelona reddet av et selvm√•l av Peter Olayinka, da spanjolene vant 2-1 i Tsjekkia.
Denne gangen fikk ikke hjemmelaget noen hjelpende h√•nd, men heller ikke tsjekkerne satte ballen i nettet ‚Äì dermed ebbet kampen ut m√•ll√∏s.
Barcelona st√•r med √•tte poeng etter fire kamper i gruppe F. Det er tre flere enn b√•de Inter og Borussia Dortmund p√• plassene bak.
Tabelljumbo Slavia Praha har kun to.

Fakta: Champions League menn tirsdag, 4. runde:

Gruppe E:



Liverpool ‚Äì Genk 2-1 (1-1)


M√•l: 1-0 Georginio Wijnaldum (14), 1-1 Mbwana Samatta (40), 2-1 Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (53).


Napoli ‚Äì Salzburg 1-1 (1-1)


M√•l: 0-1 Erling Braut Haaland (str. 11), 1-1 Hirving Lozano (44).

Gruppe F:



Barcelona ‚Äì Slavia Praha 0-0 (0-0)




Borussia Dortmund ‚Äì Inter 3-2 (0-2)


M√•l: 0-1 Lautaro Mart√≠nez (5), 0-2 Mat√≠as Vecino (40), 1-2 Achraf Hakimi (51), 2-2 Julian Brandt (64), 3-2 Hakimi (77).

Gruppe G:



Zenit St. Petersburg ‚Äì RB Leipzig 0-2 (0-1)


M√•l: 0-1 Diego Demme (45), 0-2 Marcel Sabitzer (63).


Lyon ‚Äì Benfica 3-1 (2-0)


M√•l: 1-0 Joachim Andersen (4), 2-0 Memphis Depay (33), 2-1 Haris Seferoviƒá (76), 3-1 Bertrand Traor√© (89).

Gruppe H:



Chelsea ‚Äì Ajax 4-4 (1-3)


M√•l: 0-1 Tammy Abraham (selvm√•l 2), 1-1 Jorginho (str. 4), 1-2 Quincy Promes (20), 1-3 Kepa (selvm√•l 35), 1-4 Donny van de Beek (55), 2-4 C√©sar Azpilicueta (63), 3-4 Jorginho (str. 71), 4-4 Reece James (74).


Valencia ‚Äì Lille 4-1 (0-1)


M√•l: 0-1 Victor Osimhen (25), 1-1 Dani Parejo (str. 66), 2-1 Adama Soumaoro (selvm√•l 82), 3-1 Geoffrey Kondogbia (84), 4-1 Ferran Torres (90).


Sjokktap for Barcelona etter marerittminutter: ‚Äì Alt falt fra hverandre



Barcelonas Lionel Messi omringet av Slavia Praha-spillere i tirsdagens Champions League-m√∏te p√• Camp Nou.üì∑ Foto: Joan Monfort AP Photo / NTB scanpix.

Annullert m√•l
Slavia Praha hang godt med p√• Camp Nou, og de gangene Barcelona slapp til sto Slavia-keeper Ond≈ôej Kol√°≈ô som en levende vegg.
Barcelonas stjernespiller Lionel Messi fors√∏kte seg fra alle mulige vinkler, men enten sto Kol√°≈ô eller tverrliggeren i veien for den forl√∏sende scoringen.
Barcelona var n√¶rmest scoring f√∏r pause, og det var Messi som var n√¶rmest alle da han mottok ballen ved midtstreken. Argentineren satte fart og banket ballen i undersiden av tverrliggeren med et skudd fra innsiden av sekstenmeteren.
Ballen spratt deretter tilbake til Kol√°≈ô, som bare minutter senere igjen ble satt p√• pr√∏ve av Messi. Men ogs√• denne gangen gikk keeperen seirende ut av duellen.
To minutter f√∏r dommer Michael Oliver bl√•ste til pause satte Nicolae Stanciu ballen bak hjemmelagets keeper Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen, men scoringen ble korrekt avbl√•st for offside.

Skal spille to kamper p√• ett d√∏gn: Dette er Liverpools uvanlige l√∏sning

Pipekonsert
Annen omgang var dr√∏ye 13 minutter gammel da Arturo Vidal jublet for det han trodde var Barcelona-scoring. Men igjen ble scoringen avbl√•st for offside.
Hjemmelaget presset p√• for scoring utover i omgangen, men Barcelonas stjernetrio p√• topp, med Messi, Antoine Griezmann og Ousmane Demb√©l√© fant aldri veien til m√•l.
Da dommeren bl√•ste av kampen svarte publikum med h√∏ylytt piping p√• hjemmelagets prestasjon. De var langt fra forn√∏yd med 0-0 mot Slavia Praha.
Borussia Dortmund og Inter spilte 2-2 og m√•tte n√∏ye seg med ett poeng hver i gruppens andre oppgj√∏r tirsdag.
text:
Barcelona went on a surprising loss in the Champions League
Barcelona went on an embarrassing point loss in the Champions League meeting with Czech Slavia Prague.
05 Nov 2019, 20:05 by NTB

BARCELONA - SLAVIA PRAHA 0‚Äì0

The match at Camp Nou ended 0-0. In the reverse settlement 14 days ago, Barcelona was saved by a self-imposed goal by Peter Olayinka, when the Spaniards won 2-1 in the Czech Republic.
This time, the home team did not get a helping hand, but neither did the Czechs put the ball into the net - thus the match ebbed out speechless.
Barcelona stand by eight points after four matches in Group F. There are three more than Inter and Borussia Dortmund in the places behind.
Table jumbo Slavia Praha has only two.

Facts: Men's Champions League Tuesday, Round 4:

Group E:



Liverpool - Genk 2-1 (1-1)


Goals: 1-0 Georginio Wijnaldum (14), 1-1 Mbwana Samatta (40), 2-1 Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (53).


Naples - Salzburg 1-1 (1-1)


Goals: 0-1 Erling Braut Haaland (size 11), 1-1 Hirving Lozano (44).

Group F:



Barcelona - Slavia Praha 0-0 (0-0)




Borussia Dortmund - Inter 3-2 (0-2)


Goals: 0-1 Lautaro Mart√≠nez (5), 0-2 Mat√≠as Vecino (40), 1-2 Achraf Hakimi (51), 2-2 Julian Brandt (64), 3-2 Hakimi (77).

Group G:



Zenit St. Petersburg - RB Leipzig 0-2 (0-1)


Goals: 0-1 Diego Demme (45), 0-2 Marcel Sabitzer (63).


Lyon - Benfica 3-1 (2-0)


Goals: 1-0 Joachim Andersen (4), 2-0 Memphis Depay (33), 2-1 Haris Seferoviƒá (76), 3-1 Bertrand Traor√© (89).

Group H:



Chelsea - Ajax 4-4 (1-3)


Goals: 0-1 Tammy Abraham (goal 2), 1-1 Jorginho (size 4), 1-2 Quincy Promes (20), 1-3 Kepa (goal 35), 1-4 Donny van de Beek (55) , 2-4 C√©sar Azpilicueta (63), 3-4 Jorginho (str. 71), 4-4 Reece James (74).


Valencia - Small 4-1 (0-1)


Goals: 0-1 Victor Osimhen (25), 1-1 Dani Parejo (size 66), 2-1 Adama Soumaoro (goal 82), 3-1 Geoffrey Kondogbia (84), 4-1 Ferran Torres (90).


Shock loss for Barcelona after nightmares: - Everything fell apart



Barcelona's Lionel Messi surrounded by Slavia Prague players in Tuesday's Champions League meeting at Camp Nou.üì∑ Photo: Joan Monfort AP Photo / NTB scanpix.

Canceled Goal
Slavia Prague hung well at Camp Nou, and in those times Barcelona escaped Slavia keeper Ond≈ôej Kol√°≈ô as a living wall.
Barcelona's star player Lionel Messi tried from every angle, but either Kol√°≈ô or the crossbar was in the way of the redeeming score.
Barcelona were close to scoring before the break, and it was Messi who was almost everyone when he received the ball at midfield. The Argentine accelerated and knocked the ball into the underside of the crossbar with a shot from inside the box.
The ball then bounced back to Kol√°≈ô, who just minutes later was put on trial by Messi. But also this time, the keeper went victorious out of the duel.
Two minutes before referee Michael Oliver blew for a break, Nicolae Stanciu put the ball behind the home keeper Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen, but the score was correctly blocked offside.

Must play two games in one day: This is Liverpool's unusual solution

pipe Concert
The second half was just over 13 minutes old when Arturo Vidal cheered for what he thought was Barcelona scoring. But again, the score was blown offside.
The home team pressed for scoring throughout the game, but Barcelona's star trio at the top, with Messi, Antoine Griezmann and Ousmane Demb√©l√© never found their way to goal.
As the referee blew the match, the crowd responded with a loud whistle at the home team's performance. They were far from happy with 0-0 against Slavia Prague.
Borussia Dortmund and Inter played 2-2 and had to settle for one point each in the group's second settlement on Tuesday.
